languages.text: {n}Некоторое время Соломон тяжело молчит, а затем тихо выдыхает:{/n} "Ну вы и заноза, Вольный Торговец. Умеете под... подколоть". {n}На губах Соломона играет слабая, но теплая улыбка.{/n}

{n}Solomorne maintains a heavy silence for a time, then exhales quietly.{/n} "You're like a splinter, Rogue Trader. You know how to get... under a person's skin." {n}A faint but warm smile plays on his lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время Соломон тяжело молчит, а затем тихо выдыхает:{/n} "Ну вы и заноза, Вольный Торговец. Умеете под... подколоть". {n}На губах Соломона играет слабая, но теплая улыбка.{/n}

{n}Solomorne maintains a heavy silence for a time, then exhales quietly.{/n} "You're like a splinter, Rogue Trader. You know how to get... under a person's skin." {n}A faint but warm smile plays on his lips.{/n}

{n}Solomorne maintains a heavy silence for a time, then exhales quietly.{/n} "You're like a splinter, Rogue Trader. You know how to get... under a person's skin." {n}A faint but warm smile plays on his lips.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après quelques instants de silence pesant, Solomorne pousse un léger soupir.{/n} « Vous avez un don pour faire tourner les gens en bourrique, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, {n}dit-il avec un petit sourire chaleureux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne maintains a heavy silence for a time, then exhales quietly.{/n} "You're like a splinter, Rogue Trader. You know how to get... under a person's skin." {n}A faint but warm smile plays on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après quelques instants de silence pesant, Solomorne pousse un léger soupir.{/n} « Vous avez un don pour faire tourner les gens en bourrique, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, {n}dit-il avec un petit sourire chaleureux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはしばらく重苦しい沈黙を保ち、やがて静かに息を吐いた。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、あなたはまるでトゲのようですね。人の心に…深く入り込む術を知っている」{n}ソロモーンの唇には、かすかだが温かみのある微笑が浮かんだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne maintains a heavy silence for a time, then exhales quietly.{/n} "You're like a splinter, Rogue Trader. You know how to get... under a person's skin." {n}A faint but warm smile plays on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはしばらく重苦しい沈黙を保ち、やがて静かに息を吐いた。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、あなたはまるでトゲのようですね。人の心に…深く入り込む術を知っている」{n}ソロモーンの唇には、かすかだが温かみのある微笑が浮かんだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne guarda un profundo silencio durante un tiempo y después resopla en silencio.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, es usted un dolor. Sabe cómo... sacar de quicio a alguien». {n}Esboza una sonrisa sutil pero cálida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne maintains a heavy silence for a time, then exhales quietly.{/n} "You're like a splinter, Rogue Trader. You know how to get... under a person's skin." {n}A faint but warm smile plays on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne guarda un profundo silencio durante un tiempo y después resopla en silencio.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, es usted un dolor. Sabe cómo... sacar de quicio a alguien». {n}Esboza una sonrisa sutil pero cálida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙沉默片刻，之后轻轻地呼了口气。{/n}“你就像毒晶枪一样，行商浪人。你很擅长……把别人弄得坐立难安。”{n}索罗蒙唇角露出一丝微弱而又温暖的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne maintains a heavy silence for a time, then exhales quietly.{/n} "You're like a splinter, Rogue Trader. You know how to get... under a person's skin." {n}A faint but warm smile plays on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙沉默片刻，之后轻轻地呼了口气。{/n}“你就像毒晶枪一样，行商浪人。你很擅长……把别人弄得坐立难安。”{n}索罗蒙唇角露出一丝微弱而又温暖的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, bir süre sessiz kaldıktan sonra pes edercesine iç çekiyor.{/n} "Virüs gibisiniz Hür Tacir. İnsanın kanına girmeyi bir şekilde başarıyorsunuz." {n}Dudaklarında hafif ama sıcak bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne maintains a heavy silence for a time, then exhales quietly.{/n} "You're like a splinter, Rogue Trader. You know how to get... under a person's skin." {n}A faint but warm smile plays on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne bir süre sessiz kaldıktan sonra pes edercesine iç çekiyor.{/n} "Virüs gibisiniz Hür Tacir. İnsanın kanına girmeyi bir şekilde başarıyorsunuz." {n}Dudaklarında hafif ama sıcak bir gülümseme belirir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schweigt einen Augenblick und atmet dann leise aus.{/n} "Ihr seid wie ein Splitter, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr wisst, wie man ... jemandem unter die Haut geht." {n}Ein schwaches, aber warmes Lächeln umspielt seine Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne maintains a heavy silence for a time, then exhales quietly.{/n} "You're like a splinter, Rogue Trader. You know how to get... under a person's skin." {n}A faint but warm smile plays on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schweigt einen Augenblick und atmet dann leise aus.{/n} "Ihr seid wie ein Splitter, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr wisst, wie man ... jemandem unter die Haut geht." {n}Ein schwaches, aber warmes Lächeln umspielt seine Lippen.{/n}
